package parameterizedtestapp.parameterizedtestapp.TestXXId;

import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.Before;

import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.testcasejavatemplate.TestCaseTemplateParent;
import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.test.helper.parameterizedtestapp.TestLanguageTemplatesContainer;

/**
 * Executable Example for TestApplication 'ParameterizedTestApp'.
 * Autogenerated by SysNatTesting.
 */
public class TestXXId_1_Test extends TestCaseTemplateParent
{
	protected TestLanguageTemplatesContainer testLanguageTemplatesContainer;
	
	@Before
	public void setUp() 
	{
		super.setUp();
		testLanguageTemplatesContainer = new TestLanguageTemplatesContainer(this);
	}

	@After
	public void shutdown() 
	{
		if ( ! isSkipped() && executionInfo.isApplicationStarted()) {
			if (languageTemplatesCommon != null) languageTemplatesCommon.gotoStartPage();
		}
		testLanguageTemplatesContainer = null;
		super.shutdown();
	}

	@Test
	@Override
	public void executeTestCase() 
	{
		try {
			languageTemplatesCommon.startNewXX("TestXXId_1");
			languageTemplatesCommon.importTestData("ExcelDataFile_Dataset1");
			
			// arrange block
			testLanguageTemplatesContainer.createKeywordArrangeComment();
			testLanguageTemplatesContainer.createComment("Nothing_to_arrange.");
			
			// act block
			testLanguageTemplatesContainer.createKeywordActComment();
			testLanguageTemplatesContainer.clickButton("TestSeriesData:buttonName");
			
			// assert block
			testLanguageTemplatesContainer.createKeywordAssertComment();
			testLanguageTemplatesContainer.isTextDisplayed("Welcome", "TestSeriesData:WelcomeText");
			
			closeCurrentTestCaseWithSuccess();
		} catch (Throwable e) {
			super.handleThrowable(e);
		}
	}
}
